profileAlternative.name: Nelson Baleizão
profileAlternative.headline: Application Support Specialist (.Net/SQL and Java) at Panalpina
profileAlternative.summary:
I have 18 years of experience in enterprise software development with Microsoft .Net technologies
(VB.Net, C# and ASP.net), Microsoft SQL Server Databases and Java programming.

▪ Creation, development and support of Windows Forms applications using .Net technology
▪ Creation, development and support of web based applications with client-side, server-side and
database technologies - ASP.net + SQL databases and Java + DB2 databases
▪ Good knowledge of cross-browser web implementations
▪ Development of websites with the MVC architecture model
▪ Responsive websites development
▪ Domain of current web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, jSON, JavaScript, XML, Web
Services, Web APIs and JavaScript Frameworks)
▪ Good knowledge about configuring Web Servers (Microsoft IIS Server, Apache Tomcat and IBM
WebSphere Application Server)
▪ Advanced knowledge of using source control tools like Microsoft Team Foundation Studio and
Bitbucket/Git
▪ Good knowledge of using Jira and Confluence
▪ Analysis, design and implementation of relational databases (SQL, mySQL and DB2)
▪ Advanced knowledge in Reporting tools (Crystal Reports and SQL Server Reporting Services)
▪ Advanced knowledge in Business Intelligence tools (Oracle Hyperion and Microsoft Power BI)
▪ Advanced knowledge in the administration and development of Web Parts in SharePoint 2010 and
2013
▪ Advanced user of Microsoft Office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, Access and OneNote)

positions.title: Application Support Specialist (.Net/SQL and Java)
positions.description:
▪ I integrate a global support Organisation using following-the-sun approach.
I'm providing level 2 support of critical Customer & Forwarding applications with on-call support.
I always do my best to deliver a result to customers in the first iteration.
I mainly focus on the quality of my service by monitoring the supported applications/components and taking quick actions when a problem come up. I'm able to perform deep analyses of complex issues by digging in to the source code and/or database data.
Several enhancements/improvements have been suggested by me during my daily activities which led the applications to increase their performance and stability.
I have set up an automated monitoring of theses applications/components using Zabbix (FTP inbound/outbound files, Data-flows, Windows Services, CPU, Disk Space, Memory, etc.)
Tools used: Microsoft Visual Studio 2015/2019 / IIS Server (HTTP and FTP) / SQL Server Reporting Services / SQL Server Management Studio / Zabbix.

▪ Release On-Demand of Java Web Applications using IBM WebSphere application server.

▪ Currently allocated to the Customer Portal project providing level 2 support and acting as DevOps.
Tools used: MobaXterm, DBeaver, Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, Jenkins and Monitoring tools (TestCafé and JMeter)
…
see more

positions.title: Somague
positions.description:
▪ My main tasks were design, develop and support Windows/Web-based applications written in
.Net . These applications had connectivities with Core Systems through DB Linked Servers, Web
Services calls, Web APIs, SAP RFC connectors and external providers.

▪ Corporate Intranet developed with Sharepoint 2010 using custom web-parts.
▪ Risk Analysis and Management Portal.
▪ Employee Portal: Designed and developed in full by me. Linked to HR database. In this portal, the
employee has the possibility to check the employee data card, schedule vacations, justify
absences and add skills.
▪ Developed a Windows Forms application for Somague Human Resources (Travel module, Fleet
management module, Salary module, Training module, etc.)

Tools used: Microsoft Visual Studio 2003-2005-2010, IIS Server, SQL Server Tools, SQL Server Integration Services, SQL Server Reporting Services, SAP .Net Connector, Crystal Reports
…
see more
